titles.title: Electron microprobe analyses of Apollo 14 high-Ti glasses from Lunar samples 14301, 14307, 14313, 14049

resource.publisher: EarthChem Library(ECL) | Interdisciplinary Earth Data Alliance (IEDA) | Columbia University; doi:10.17616/R3V644

rightsList.rights: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States [CC BY-NC-SA 3.0]

descriptions.description: Electron microprobe analyses of Apollo 14 high-Ti glasses from Lunar samples 14301, 14307, 14313, and 14049.

Related publications: Chen H.-K., Delano J.W., and Lindsley D.H. (1982) Chemistry and phase relations of VLT volcanic glasses from Apollo 14 and Apollo 17. Proceedings of the 13th Lunar and Planetary Science Conference, Journal of Geophysical Research, Supplement, vol. 88, p. A171-A181.
Delano, J.W. (1986) Pristine lunar glasses: Criteria, data, and implications. Proceedings of the 16th Lunar and Planetary Science Conference, J. Geophysical Research, Supplement, 91, B4, D201-D213.
Delano J.W. (1988) Apollo 14 regolith breccias: Different glass populations and their potential for charting space/time variations. Proceedings of the 18th Lunar and Planetary Science Conference, Cambridge University Press, p. 59-65.
